title: Hi Tech colleges
body: <p><a href="http://slashdot.org/articles/04/10/22/177226.shtml?tid=146&amp;tid=95&amp;tid=193" title="i don't really read /.">Slashdot has a post about "America's Most Connected Campuses"</a>. #1 is in Upstate NY, 5 out of the top 20 are in NY and 4 of those are in Upstate NY.  On an educational note, I'd like to tell SoCal and SiliValley to "suck it" - but on an economical note, I now understand why the IT market in this area is so flooded, and why my salary (according to all those depressing surveys) is well below the national average for what I do.</p>
